response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance your operations and add substantial value to your business. Given its importance to you, I understand its worth to be $15,000. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $13,000. This price reflects a fair compromise considering both the value it holds for you and my need to ensure a profitable transaction. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you.", "product_price": 13000}
